Plot: The murderous, backwoods Firefly family take to the road to escape a vengeful police force which is not afraid of being as ruthless as their target.
Title: The Devil's Rejects
Actors: Sid Haig, Bill Moseley, Sheri Moon Zombie, William Forsythe
tomatoConsensus: Zombie has improved as a filmmaker since "House of 1000 Corpses" and will please fans of the genre, but beware -- the horror is nasty, relentless, and sadistic.
